price: 13 L’homme sera, ce Jour-là, informé de ses actes les plus insignifiants.
arabic: يُنَبَّؤُاْ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ يَوۡمَئِذِۭ بِمَا قَدَّمَ وَأَخَّرَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: yunabba-u al-insānu yawma-idhin bimā qaddama wa-akhara
